comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Zoom with pinch-gesture (two fingers) and instantly release fingers What is the expected output? What do you see instead? 2. The map jumps instead of staying centered Note that if I zoom and hold it for a while before releasing my fingers, it works perfectly. I already tried to increase MultiTouchController.EVENT_SETTLE_TIME_INTERVAL but with no success. I tried a lot but had no success yet, so I would appreciate every hint/solution.
This issue can be closed because of http://code.google.com/p/osmdroid/issues/detail?id=481&start=100
